Thinking about the exam , Rafiq came up with an idea . He saw that they had total 8 subjects in their annual exam . He quickly made a routine of 8 days for 8 subjects . The routine is - on Day - 1 he will study English for 3 hours , on Day - 2 he will study Bangla for 4 hours , Day - 3 he will study Math for 6 hours , Day - 4 he will study Science for 3 hours , on Day - 5 he will review the Social Science for 7 hours , on Day - 6 he will revise Social Science for 5 hours , on Day - 7 he will study English Grammar for 9 hours , and the final day ( Day - 8 ) he will study Bangla Grammar for 2 hours

Before I could understand his style , in the second round he improvised and I missed most of my attacks and received a lot of blows from him resulting in a very low score of 1 . Third round I changed my strategy and worked on my defense and got a better understanding with his renewed approach ; so I scored 3 . Applying the knowledge coupled with my new strategy I landed the most aggressive blows and put him on the ground resulting in a successful round with a score of 8 . However , he got back up and in the next round he fought back much better , and although I successfully landed a few fatal blows the success rate decreases and I couldn ' t knock him out in the final round scoring 3 points again . It was one hell of a fight .
